pageTitle: Patagonia Women's Spring River Waders - Regular
textBeforeTable: Fit note: Our waders are less bulky than most brands yet still allow room for layering. The adjustable suspender and belt system can customize the fit +/- three inches in torso width and height. Measurements refer to body size, not garment dimensions, and are in inches, unless otherwise noted. Inseam measurements are from crotch to floor. up to 5'9" Height 9-10 9-10 6-7 8-9 - - Shoe Size 32 32 32 32 - - Inseam 46½ 43-44½ 40½-41½ 40½-41½ - - Hip 38 34½-36 32-33 32-33 - - Waist 44 40½-42 38-39 38-39 - - Chest X-Large Large MS (6-7) Medium Small X-Small FULL up to 5'9" Height 9-10 9-10 6-7 8-9 6-7 6-7 Shoe Size 32 32 32 32 32
